name: Xiao-xuan Pan
title: About
description:
I have one year of front-end development experience, from small personal projects to large-scale commercial cases, and I am currently working as a front-end intern in an Internet company. 
I understand how to make a complete web page with front-end tools HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript and React framework. 
Also have basic back-end knowledge such as server creation and database operation, and be able to connect front-end and back-end data through API. 
In addition, I have accumulated a lot of experience in communicating with PMs and back-end developers to solve problems.
